about_the_game:
In a small quiet town, a girl has gone missing.

Your best friend has enlisted you to aid her in a solo investigation to track her down and bring her home.

She's probably just lost in the woods or something. Probably.

Explore a colorful town and solve a mystery that winds and weaves into a shape that covers the entire community, leading you to believe that there may be something else at hand in her disappearance.

FEATURES

    -Colorful locations to explore within a lovely little town.

    -Equally colorful array of characters to talk to and probably pick a favorite. (Mine is Grover btw)

    -A mystery that seeps deep into the roots of the place you call home.

    -Visuals made from one silly little guy! (Who's also very handsome and smart)

name: Oblivistar

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800H with Radeon Graphics
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: AMD High Definition Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800H with Radeon Graphics
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: AMD High Definition Audio Device

short_description: Oblivistar is a story-driven adventure game where you will help solve a mystery that sinks into the place you call home.
